# NEOS: jQuery and Squarespace
---

Welcome to Lecture 3! Here are the main points of today's class.

#### Main Goals
---

1. Understand how jQuery works as the "connective" tissue between our javascript functions and user UI interactions
2. Understand how jQuery plugins can help us solve hard problems quickly
3. Learn a little bit about how we can customize Squarespace themes ourselves

#### Game Plan
---

#### [Mad Libs](#mad-libs)
#### [jQuery Plugins Intro](#jquery-plugins-intro)
#### [Slideshows](#slideshows)
#### [Squarespace Basics](#squarespace-basics)

jquery-plugins-intro.content:
# jQuery Plugins Intro
---

Let's now modify our madlibs app to use a drag-and-drop interaction instead.

#### How-to
---

1. Find a [suitable plugin](http://lmgtfy.com/?q=javascript+drag+and+drop+library).
2. Read documentation on how to use that plugin
3. Pull in the plugin files - js, css files necessary to make plugin work
3. Hook up your javascript code (functions you've written, jquery ui code you've written) to play nice with the plugin
4. ???
5. Profit!

#### Exercise
---

1. Modify the **[MadLibs app](https://github.com/mottaquikarim/tkc-madlibs)** to use drag and drop plugin.

squarespace-basics.content:
# Squarespace Basics
---

1. Create a squarespace account
2. Turn on developer mode
3. **[Download filezilla](https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?type=client)**
4. Pull down template files, make changes
5. Push back up and verify changes
